title: Jingle Land
subtitle: The Land of Music and Entertainment
location: Palm Meadows, Prestige Ozone, Whitefield Main Road, Whitefield, Devasandra Industrial Estate, Krishnarajapura
description:
Hello Music Enthusiasts! JINGLE LAND is here!
Experience the electrifying atmosphere of a musical extravaganza as diverse bands unite on one stage. Vibrant melodies fill the air, ranging from soulful ballads to heart-pounding rhythms. Enthusiastic crowds sway in harmony, immersed in the pulsating energy of live performances. Each band will bring its unique flair, captivating audiences with its raw talent and infectious passion.

title: Core Summer Festival Bangalore
subtitle: Beat the Summer!
location: Bengaluru
description:
Two days of food, cocktails, dance and music awaits you!
Can’t wait to meet up with magical unicorns, trippy mermaids, and our favorite #fashion, #Culture, and #art lovers this June!! 😀 🌈🌺🌴🦋

Performances:
Friday
Shreyas_
Dc
Mental machine
Vilas Monappa
Holy trinity 
Vivin

Saturday 
Blaque
Adrian lewis
Somyth
Digvijay x Ashutosh(hybrid set)
Aadat
A John

Chef’s Table by Chef Sajid Patel!

Bar Takeover by Samarth Gangthade!

title: Aggressive Tendencies: The Gathering
location: 1st floor of Gillys redefined,# 413, 100 Feet Road,, 4th Block, Koramangala, KHB Block Koramangala, Koramangala 4-B Block, 5th Block, Koramangala
description: After 30 successful editions, Aggressive Tendencies is expanding its horizons to Bangalore, presenting one of its most monumental shows yet and unveiling an exciting new event: THE GATHERING. Prepare for the most brutal midweek gathering, showcasing the most intense lineup of the year featuring DEFEATED SANITY, GODLESS, and ANORECTAL ULCERATION. Join us for an unforgettable night of unbridled energy and unparalleled performances. Don't miss out on this epic installment of Aggressive Tendencies as we kick off a new era with The Gathering.

title: Free Earth Festival Bangalore Pre-Event
subtitle: Bangalore's Biggest Music Festival
location: Kumarakrupa Rd, opposite Golf Club, Kumara Park East, Seshadripuram, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
description:
One of the Biggest music festival is back to India in Bangalore. It's Free Earth festival Pre-Event happening again after 5years
Featuring line-up 
• *Avalon*- Nano Records (UK) - Goa Trance
• *Nitin*- Hilltop music - Goa Trance
• *Kalinga son* - Hilltop music - Goa Trance
• *Siva prayojan* - Subtrail/Music 4 aliens - Techno 
• *Akhlad Ahmed* - Cafe de Anatolia /Supermatic sounds - Trance fusion 
• *Analilia* - Khazad Records - Melodic Techno 
• *Fluro* - Independent - Melodic Techno 
• *Anna Breathe* - Independent - Melodic Techno

title: LIL MIC | A dowithlit Open Mic for Kids
subtitle: Step into a world of wonder and watch as young stars ignite the stage
location: SLR Arcade, Haralur Road, Apartments, near Prestige Ferns Residency
description: Hello Bengaluru! Calling all young superstars-in-the-making! Get ready to rock the mic and light up the stage at our famed open mics, now for kids🌟🎤 It's an explosion of talent as kids aged 5-13 unleash their inner rockstars, comedians, poets, and everything in between! With each act more electrifying than the last, this event is a rollercoaster ride of laughs, cheers, and jaw-dropping moments. Bring your friends, bring your family, and get ready to be blown away by the sheer awesomeness of our little performers!   DWL Open Mic brings you a platform to perform your poetry, stories, or music. Our open mics which became popular online during the lockdown, are now going around cities in India bringing like-minded artists together to perform, jam, and network. Perform or catch the best performances from some of the most talented artists in your city.

title: Vineeth Srinivasan Live
subtitle: A Musical Journey
location: Palm Meadows, Prestige Ozone, Whitefield Main Road, Whitefield, Devasandra Industrial Estate, Krishnarajapura
description: Join us for an unforgettable evening with Vineeth Srinivasan on 13th July 2024 at Phoenix Marketcity, Whitefield. Presented by Noizz Entertainment in association with Sia Entertainment, this concert promises to be a musical extravaganza.  Vineeth Srinivasan is a celebrated figure in the Indian music industry, renowned for his contributions to Indian cinema. Not only a star in the Malayalam music scene, Vineeth is also a multilingual singer, captivating audiences with songs in Tamil, Telugu, and Hindi. His melodic richness and emotional depth have made him a beloved artist!  Experience his famous hits like "Karale" from Ustad Hotel, "Anuraagam" from Thattathin Marayathu, "Akaleyo Nee" from Urumi, "Thangamey" from Naanum Rowdy Dhaan, and "Mental Madhilo" from Okka Kshanam. Don't miss this chance to see Vineeth Srinivasan live and witness his versatile talent firsthand!

title: Karaoke Nights
subtitle: Ft KJ Naveen
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
description:
Have you ever let your inner bathroom singer play for the rest of the world?
If not, our Karaoke Nights are the perfect opportunity to let loose and sing like no one is watching with a group of people who care about your passion of singing and want to share it with you.
Bring your friends and family to Hard Rock Cafe, Bengaluru for an unforgettable Karaoke night.

title: Boogie Nights
subtitle: Ft Prashu
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
description:
Make some noise and have fun, since the music gets two times better when a DJ lifts his hands in the air.
Every Friday night, starting at 8:30 p.m., Hard Rock Cafe, Bengaluru is happy to host DJ PRASHU and his incredible sounds for the musically charged Blockbusters.
Prepare to party and enjoy the evening with excellent food, live music, and cool drinks.

title: Hard Rock
subtitle: Ft Vortex
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description: Embark on a mesmerising journey as the live band performance takes centre stage, delivering an electrifying live performance that captures the essence of rhythmic magic. Immerse yourself in an unforgettable musical experience, where every note and beat harmonize to create an electrifying atmosphere, leaving you enchanted and immersed in the magic of music.

title: Classic Rock
subtitle: Ft Sentient Collective
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
Join us for an evening full of unforgettable music, and tremendous vibes, and catch The Sentient Collective playing live on 8th June, 9 pm onwards only at the Hard Rock Cafe, Bengaluru.
The magic of music will fill the air when The Sentient Collective will be performing live in the house!
Mark your calendars, everyone!!

*Rs. 500 cover charge mandatory at entry gate

title: Classic Rock
subtitle: Ft. Butterfingers
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
The Butterfingers….the band of brothers…err…band of friends are coming together again at Wanderers to enthrall you with Retro Recapture, as evening of music from the '60s through the '90s!
Highly versatile to make you swing and jive, Butterfingers will give you an evening to relive and revive your memories.
Dominic D’Cruz on Bass & Vocals; Eric Samuel on Guitar and vocals; Niranjan Joseph on Flute, Bass, and Vocals; Canute D’Cruz on Drums & Vocals, and Joshua Costa on the Key Board, the Fab Five of Bangalore are sure to thrill you with their music as they always do.

title: Tribute to Queen
subtitle: Ft Kapow (From Delhi)
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
BAM! Have you ever been hit with a punch so unexpected, it leaves you reeling? Well, that`s exactly what a KAPOW! performance feels like! With explosive energy and stage antics that will make your head spin, KAPOW! delivers exactly what you need and so much more! KAPOW!’s songwriting is both musically and lyrically diverse, from Pop-Rock ballads to eclectic Sci-Fi-inspired tracks. Their 1st album is a rollercoaster ride of musical genres. They even made history by becoming the FIRST INDIAN BAND TO GO DRAG during their album launch, all in the name of learning, experiencing, and creating awareness about Drag culture in India.

*Rs. 500 cover charge mandatory at entry gate.

title: Dimensions
subtitle: Live Music
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
Dimensions, a band that performs in various genres, was formed by rock renegades from Bangalore. With nearly 40 years of live music experience between the members of the band, the band`s primary focus is to re-create and offer the best live musical experiences to its audiences.
Be there to see them live at your favourite Hard Rock Cafe Bengaluru location.

title: Tribute to Eric Clapton & The Beatles
subtitle: Ft Crystal Codes
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
At the Hard Rock Cafe Whitefield, the progressive rock band Crystal Codes will pay homage to Eric Clapton and The Beatles.
If you are a Beatles or Eric Clapton fan, (how can you not be?) then join us for this memorable night at Hard Rock Cafe, Whitefield.
And of course, enjoy some beer and great bar fare as the ticket cost includes cover charges.

*Rs. 500 cover charge mandatory at entry gate.

subtitle: Bangalore’s Greatest Fusion Fest
location: BBMP, Block 2 Village, Varthur, 2034/69, Ambalipura - Sarjapur Rd, Kaikondrahalli
description:
Join us for an unforgettable night as one of Delhi’s most famous bands brings their electrifying 7-piece performance to Bangalore! Feel the rhythm, embrace the harmony, and let the music linger in your soul.
Live 7-piece band performance
	• Spectacular sound and light show
	• Energetic and soulful music
	• An evening to remember with friends and family

title: SCC SkyCinema - Before Sunset
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: 1/2, Old Madras Rd, Halasuru, Someshwarpura, Sivanchetti Gardens
description:
"You can never replace anyone because everyone is made up of such beautiful specific details." - Before Sunset 

Join us for a magical evening of romance and nostalgia as Sunset Cinema Club presents a screening of this beloved film! Experience the timeless beauty of love, connection, and second chances under the twinkling night sky at 1 MG - Lido Mall.

Enjoy your favourite movie on a breezy terrace, perched on the rooftop of 1 mg- Lido Mall. Here you'll have an unobstructed view of the night sky, creating a unique and immersive cinema experience as you sink into comfy bean bags and watch the movie on a large screen with the skyline of the city as your backdrop.

title: SCC SkyCinema - The Proposal
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: Konanakunte Cross Metro Station, Anjanadri Layout, Konanakunte
description:
" Marry me. Because I'd like to date you." - The Proposal

Sunset Cinema Club invites you to immerse yourself in a heartwarming love story that will leave you smiling. Get ready for plenty of laughs and an unforgettable night of cinematic joy at Forum South Bengaluru.

Enjoy your favourite movie on a breezy terrace, perched on the rooftop of Forum South Bengaluru Mall. Here you'll have an unobstructed view of the night sky, creating a unique and immersive cinema experience as you sink into comfy bean bags or mattresses and watch the movie on a large screen with the skyline of the city as your backdrop.

title: Paint Bar- Guided Workshops
subtitle: Anyone can paint
location: 4th Floor, Sankey Tank, 8th, Main, 10th Cross Rd, above wonderslate office, Sadashiva Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560080
description: Join us for a fun Paint Party! Unwind and get creative with easy-to-follow instructions and all painting supplies provided. Perfect for beginners or experienced painters alike. Whether solo, with family, or friends, it's guaranteed fun!

title: AXEL HAUBE Live
subtitle: Ultimate techno showcase
location: passport office, Mantri Avenue, next to Koramangala, KHB Games Village, Koramangala
description: Get ready for the ultimate techno showcase in your city - CentiGrade Club Nights! Catch the Watergate & Zamna Records sensation AXEL HAUBE live at Sunburn Union this Sunday.

title: Vini Vici at Sunburn Union
subtitle: Witness Vini Vici's electrifying set
location: passport office, Mantri Avenue, next to Koramangala, KHB Games Village, Koramangala
description:
Get ready for an unforgettable night as Vini Vici, the renowned Israeli psytrance duo, takes over Sunburn Union on June 15th! Comprising Aviram Saharai and Matan Kadosh, Vini Vici burst onto the psytrance scene in 2012 with their distinctive fusion of progressive and full-on psytrance. Since then, they have skyrocketed to fame with numerous top-charting releases on Beatport and collaborations with industry giants like Ace Ventura & Astrix, 
Vini Vici first captured global attention with their debut single “The Tribe,” followed by other massive hits such as “Great Spirit,” and “Parapa,” Their dynamic sound has resonated across the globe, earning them spots at premier festivals like Ozora Festival and Tomorrowland.
Known for their powerful basslines, melodic synths, and uplifting melodies, Vini Vici's tracks are a staple in the psytrance world.

title: SCC Movies & Chill - Crazy Stupid Love
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: 2/ 3/ 4/ 5 Floor, Nexus Shantiniketan Mall, ITPL Main Rd, Thigalarapalya, Whitefield
description:
"I will never stop trying. Because when you find the one... you never give up." - Crazy Stupid Love

Come join us for an intimate indoor film screening of the romantic comedy 'Crazy Stupid Love' at our newest venue in Bangalore 'Fox In The Field'. Be prepared to indulge in this roller coaster of a film with interconnected love stories sure to make you laugh. 
Movies & Chill is an indoor cinema experience.

title: Soul Jams | 2nd Anniversary Edition
subtitle: By Soul Ventures
location: 1/2, Old Madras Rd, Halasuru, Someshwarpura, Sivanchetti Gardens
description:
Soul Jams is the ultimate destination for music lovers! Join us for an evening of relaxation, unwinding, and rejuvenation. Our welcoming space allows you to be yourself and feel at home. 
Bring your guitars, cajones, and voices to sing your heart out alongside our vibrant community in a beautiful jamming session. 

The event comprises three soul-enriching parts: 

1. Soul Open Mic: Perform for a warm and appreciative audience, regardless of where you are on your musical journey. Reach out to @souljams_live on Instagram to book your slot.
2. Social Mixers: Connect with like-minded individuals and find your tribe, fostering meaningful connections. 
3. Soul Jamming: Sing, play instruments, and join the community in a spontaneous, free-flowing musical experience. We create music together, fostering an atmosphere of refreshment and excitement.

title: Jackfruit Dance Party
subtitle: ft. Devious Quest, Skye, GST, Hash & That90'sKid
location: Plot 37, 80 Feet Rd, Hal, HAL 3rd Stage, New Tippasandra, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560075
description: After a sweaty, hazy, vibey, smiley-faced banger the last time out, we’re back with @prithvi_gstmusic & @achal_wickid from @twokidwickid, and we will be joined by @moan_appa + @devious_quest b2b @skyedotin.

title: SCC Fan Arena - Ind Vs Pak
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: Whitefield Main Rd, Thigalarapalya, Krishnarajapura
description:
Mauka Mauka !! 

Sunset Cinema Club is excited to announce an exhilarating T20 World Cup screening of  India Vs Pakistan in partnership with Nexus Shantiniketan Mall. Watch this legendary clash in a stadium-like setting on the BIG screen with fellow fans cheering for India and an unmatched vibe! 

We've created a fan arena for all you 'True Blue' Fans in Bengaluru and won't stop cheering till our boys win it for India.

title: Concerts Connect
subtitle: Connecting Hearts through Soulful Sounds
location: 99, Residency Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description: Welcome to an evening where the rhythms of your soul find resonance in every note. Join us for a concert experience that transcends mere entertainment to forge deep connections. From catchy tunes that get your feet tapping to soulful melodies that stir your spirit, immerse yourself in a sonic journey that unites hearts and minds. Let the music weave its magic, weaving threads of joy, nostalgia, and emotion as we come together to celebrate the universal language of music
